# Change Log - AWS AppSync Codegen

### Enhancements

* Fixes undeclared type errors when generating Swift enumerations, removed the Apollo module name as it doesnâ€™t exist in this context. See [PR #14](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-appsync-codegen/pull/14)

* Update package dependencies

## [Release 0.17.3](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-appsync-codegen/releases/tag/0.17.3)

### New Features

* Adds support for AWS AppSync Defined Scalars such as `AWSTimestamp`.
